QuestData.Title: Captain Dreadbeard
QuestData.Description: Alright, babe, I've got something bigger for you to take on here.$B$BWe spotted the captain of the Southsea over on one of his boats to the south; that's to the south, and NOT the one we've been suicidally bum-rushing for the better part of several hours. He's sitting up there, smug and stoic, watching us war down here.$B$BI'll spare you the "hostile takeover" jokes. Get on his ship and beat the tar out of him, and we're done here!
QuestData.CompletionText: I'm flattered that you'd rather stay here and flirt with me than go kill that pirate captain. So flattered that I might not fire you if you get going right now and do it already.
QuestData.RewardText: Sea giants? You think he was training them towards Gadgetzan on purpose?$B$BWhatever, he's splitsville now. And Gadgetzan owes us big time! I can't wait to see the look on Marin's face.$B$BHere's your cut, babe. You're moving up in the world.
